---
title: "Fit model"
sidebar: start
---

Once a function is defined declaring the model, you can fit the model to the data using the ```fit``` function.

::: {.panel-tabset group="language"}
## Python
``` python
m.fit(model)  # Optimize model parameters through MCMC sampling
```
## R
``` R
m$fit(model) # Optimize model parameters through MCMC sampling
```
:::
